import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, } from '@/components/ui/table'; import { Plus, Search, Scissors, Clock, DollarSign, MoreHorizontal, Edit, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react'; import { useBarbershop } from '@/contexts/BarbershopContext'; const Services = () => { const { currentBarbershop } = useBarbershop(); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); // Mock data - TODO: Replace with real data from Supabase const services = [ { id: '1', name: 'Corte Masculino', description: 'Corte tradicional masculino', duration: 30, price: 50, category: 'Cabelo', isActive: true, totalBookings: 145 }, { id: '2', name: 'Corte + Barba', description: 'Corte completo com barba', duration: 45, price: 70, category: 'Completo', isActive: true, totalBookings: 98 }, { id: '3', name: 'Barba', description: 'Apenas barba', duration: 20, price: 35, category: 'Barba', isActive: true, totalBookings: 87 }, { id: '4', name: 'Corte Infantil', description: 'Corte para crianÃ§as atÃ© 12 anos', duration: 25, price: 35, category: 'Cabelo', isActive: true, totalBookings: 42 }, { id: '5', name: 'HidrataÃ§Ã£o', description: 'Tratamento de hidrataÃ§Ã£o capilar', duration: 60, price: 80, category: 'Tratamento', isActive: false, totalBookings: 15 } ]; const filteredServices = services.filter(service => service.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || service.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const stats = { totalServices: services.length, activeServices: services.filter(s => s.isActive).length, averagePrice: Math.round(services.reduce((acc, s) => acc + s.price, 0) / services.length), totalRevenue: services.reduce((acc, s) => acc + (s.price * s.totalBookings), 0) }; return (

version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250921-213507
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250921-211244
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

frontend:

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-024247
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250921-211244
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-024545
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-024643
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

content.text: Perfeito! Agora vou criar as tabelas no novo banco:

content.content:
1â†’-- ===============================================
     2â†’-- SISTEMA DE BARBEARIA - SCHEMA COMPLETO
     3â†’-- ===============================================
     4â†’
     5â†’-- Extension para UUID
     6â†’CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pgcrypto";
     7â†’
     8â†’-- ===============================================
     9â†’-- 1. TABELA BARBEARIAS
    10â†’-- ===============================================
    11â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS barbershops (
    12â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    13â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    14â†’    slug VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    15â†’    logo_url TEXT,
    16â†’    address JSONB,
    17â†’    phone VARCHAR(20),
    18â†’    email VARCHAR(255),
    19â†’    plan_id VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'basic',
    20â†’    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    21â†’    owner_id UUID,
    22â†’    settings JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    23â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    24â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
    25â†’);
    26â†’
    27â†’-- ===============================================
    28â†’-- 2. TABELA CLIENTES
    29â†’-- ===============================================
    30â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS clients (
    31â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    32â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    33â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    34â†’    phone VARCHAR(20),
    35â†’    email VARCHAR(255),
    36â†’    birth_date DATE,
    37â†’    address TEXT,
    38â†’    preferred_barber_id UUID,
    39â†’    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    40â†’    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    41â†’    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    42â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vip
    43â†’    notes TEXT,
    44â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    45â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
    46â†’);
    47â†’
    48â†’-- ===============================================
    49â†’-- 3. TABELA BARBEIROS
    50â†’-- ===============================================
    51â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS barbers (
    52â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    53â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    54â†’    user_id UUID, -- para futuro sistema de auth
    55â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    56â†’    phone VARCHAR(20),
    57â†’    email VARCHAR(255),
    58â†’    photo_url TEXT,
    59â†’    specialty TEXT[],
    60â†’    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    61â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vacation
    62â†’    hire_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    63â†’    working_hours JSONB DEFAULT '{"monday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"tuesday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"wednesday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"thursday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"friday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"saturday":{"start":"09:00","end":"17:00","active":true},"sunday":{"start":"09:00","end":"15:00","active":false}}',
    64â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    65â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
    66â†’);
    67â†’
    68â†’-- ===============================================
    69â†’-- 4. TABELA SERVIÃ‡OS
    70â†’-- ===============================================
    71â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS services (
    72â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    73â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    74â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    75â†’    description TEXT,
    76â†’    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'corte',
    77â†’    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
    78â†’    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    79â†’    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    80â†’    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    81â†’    image_url TEXT,
    82â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    83â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
    84â†’);
    85â†’
    86â†’-- ===============================================
    87â†’-- 5. TABELA PRODUTOS
    88â†’-- ===============================================
    89â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products (
    90â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    91â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    92â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    93â†’    description TEXT,
    94â†’    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'outros',
    95â†’    brand VARCHAR(100),
    96â†’    barcode VARCHAR(50),
    97â†’    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    98â†’    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    99â†’    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
   100â†’    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5,
   101â†’    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
   102â†’    image_url TEXT,
   103â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   104â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   105â†’);
   106â†’
   107â†’-- ===============================================
   108â†’-- 6. TABELA AGENDAMENTOS
   109â†’-- ===============================================
   110â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS appointments (
   111â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
   112â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   113â†’    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   114â†’    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   115â†’    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   116â†’    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
   117â†’    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
   118â†’    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
   119â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'scheduled', -- scheduled, confirmed, in_progress, completed, cancelled
   120â†’    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   121â†’    notes TEXT,
   122â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   123â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   124â†’);
   125â†’
   126â†’-- ===============================================
   127â†’-- 7. TABELA VENDAS
   128â†’-- ===============================================
   129â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sales (
   130â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
   131â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   132â†’    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
   133â†’    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
   134â†’    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
   135â†’    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   136â†’    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   137â†’    discount DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
   138â†’    total DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   139â†’    payment_method VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'cash', -- cash, card, pix
   140â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'completed', -- pending, completed, cancelled
   141â†’    notes TEXT,
   142â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   143â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   144â†’);
   145â†’
   146â†’-- ===============================================
   147â†’-- 8. TABELA ITENS DA VENDA
   148â†’-- ===============================================
   149â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sale_items (
   150â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
   151â†’    sale_id UUID REFERENCES sales(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   152â†’    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- service, product
   153â†’    item_id UUID NOT NULL, -- service_id ou product_id
   154â†’    quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
   155â†’    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   156â†’    total_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   157â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   158â†’);
   159â†’
   160â†’-- ===============================================
   161â†’-- 9. TABELA MOVIMENTAÃ‡Ã•ES DE ESTOQUE
   162â†’-- ===============================================
   163â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_movements (
   164â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
   165â†’    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   166â†’    movement_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- in, out, adjustment
   167â†’    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
   168â†’    reason VARCHAR(255),
   169â†’    reference_id UUID, -- sale_id, purchase_id, etc
   170â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   171â†’);
   172â†’
   173â†’-- ===============================================
   174â†’-- 10. TABELA SERVIÃ‡OS DOS BARBEIROS (RELAÃ‡ÃƒO N:N)
   175â†’-- ===============================================
   176â†’CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS barber_services (
   177â†’    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   178â†’    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
   179â†’    PRIMARY KEY (barber_id, service_id)
   180â†’);
   181â†’
   182â†’-- ===============================================
   183â†’-- ÃNDICES PARA PERFORMANCE
   184â†’-- ===============================================
   185â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_date ON appointments(appointment_date);
   186â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_barber ON appointments(barber_id);
   187â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_client ON appointments(client_id);
   188â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_barbershop ON appointments(barbershop_id);
   189â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sales_date ON sales(sale_date);
   190â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sales_barbershop ON sales(barbershop_id);
   191â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_clients_phone ON clients(phone);
   192â†’CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_clients_barbershop ON clients(barbershop_id);
   193â†’
   194â†’-- ===============================================
   195â†’-- TRIGGER PARA UPDATED_AT
   196â†’-- ===============================================
   197â†’CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
   198â†’RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
   199â†’BEGIN
   200â†’    NEW.updated_at = NOW();
   201â†’    RETURN NEW;
   202â†’END;
   203â†’$$ language 'plpgsql';
   204â†’
   205â†’-- Aplicar trigger em todas as tabelas com updated_at
   206â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_barbershops_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbershops FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   207â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_clients_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON clients FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   208â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_barbers_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbers FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   209â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_services_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON services FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   210â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_products_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON products FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   211â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_appointments_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON appointments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   212â†’CREATE TRIGGER update_sales_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON sales FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
   213â†’
   214â†’-- ===============================================
   215â†’-- DADOS INICIAIS DE EXEMPLO
   216â†’-- ===============================================
   217â†’
   218â†’-- Inserir barbearias
   219â†’INSERT INTO barbershops (name, slug, address, phone, email, plan_id, is_active) VALUES
   220â†’('Barbearia ClÃ¡ssica', 'barbearia-classica',
   221â†’ '{"street":"Rua das Flores, 123","city":"SÃ£o Paulo","state":"SP","zipCode":"01234-567"}',
   222â†’ '(11) 99999-9999', 'contato@barbeariaclassica.com', 'premium', true),
   223â†’('Corte & Estilo', 'corte-estilo',
   224â†’ '{"street":"Av. Paulista, 456","city":"SÃ£o Paulo","state":"SP","zipCode":"01310-100"}',
   225â†’ '(11) 88888-8888', 'contato@corteestilo.com', 'basic', true)
   226â†’ON CONFLICT (slug) DO NOTHING;
   227â†’
   228â†’-- Inserir barbeiros
   229â†’INSERT INTO barbers (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, specialty, commission_rate, status)

   375â†’    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients c WHERE c.barbershop_id = bb.id AND c.status = 'active') as total_clients,

   378â†’    (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) FROM sales s WHERE s.barbershop_id = bb.id AND DATE(s.sale_date) = CURRENT_DATE) as revenue_today
   379â†’FROM barbershops bb
   380â†’WHERE bb.is_active = true;
   381â†’
   382â†’-- View para agendamentos com detalhes
   383â†’CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW appointments_detailed AS
   384â†’SELECT
   385â†’    a.id,
   386â†’    a.barbershop_id,

   401â†’JOIN barbers b ON a.barber_id = b.id

-- ===============================================
-- SISTEMA DE BARBEARIA - SCHEMA COMPLETO
-- ===============================================

-- Extension para UUID
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pgcrypto";

-- ===============================================
-- 1. TABELA BARBEARIAS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS barbershops (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    logo_url TEXT,
    address JSONB,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    plan_id VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'basic',
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    owner_id UUID,
    settings JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 2. TABELA CLIENTES
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS clients (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    address TEXT,
    preferred_barber_id UUID,
    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vip
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 3. TABELA BARBEIROS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS barbers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    user_id UUID, -- para futuro sistema de auth
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    photo_url TEXT,
    specialty TEXT[],
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active', -- active, inactive, vacation
    hire_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    working_hours JSONB DEFAULT '{"monday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"tuesday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"wednesday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"thursday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"friday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","active":true},"saturday":{"start":"09:00","end":"17:00","active":true},"sunday":{"start":"09:00","end":"15:00","active":false}}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 4. TABELA SERVIÃ‡OS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS services (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'corte',
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 5. TABELA PRODUTOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'outros',
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    barcode VARCHAR(50),
    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 6. TABELA AGENDAMENTOS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS appointments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL, -- em minutos
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'scheduled', -- scheduled, confirmed, in_progress, completed, cancelled
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 7. TABELA VENDAS
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sales (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    total DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'cash', -- cash, card, pix
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'completed', -- pending, completed, cancelled
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 8. TABELA ITENS DA VENDA
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sale_items (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    sale_id UUID REFERENCES sales(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- service, product
    item_id UUID NOT NULL, -- service_id ou product_id
    quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 9. TABELA MOVIMENTAÃ‡Ã•ES DE ESTOQUE
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_movements (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    movement_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- in, out, adjustment
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    reference_id UUID, -- sale_id, purchase_id, etc
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ===============================================
-- 10. TABELA SERVIÃ‡OS DOS BARBEIROS (RELAÃ‡ÃƒO N:N)
-- ===============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS barber_services (
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    PRIMARY KEY (barber_id, service_id)
);

-- ===============================================
-- ÃNDICES PARA PERFORMANCE
-- ===============================================
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_date ON appointments(appointment_date);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_barber ON appointments(barber_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_client ON appointments(client_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_appointments_barbershop ON appointments(barbershop_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sales_date ON sales(sale_date);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sales_barbershop ON sales(barbershop_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_clients_phone ON clients(phone);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_clients_barbershop ON clients(barbershop_id);

-- ===============================================
-- TRIGGER PARA UPDATED_AT
-- ===============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    NEW.updated_at = NOW();
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ language 'plpgsql';

-- Aplicar trigger em todas as tabelas com updated_at
CREATE TRIGGER update_barbershops_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbershops FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_clients_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON clients FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_barbers_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON barbers FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_services_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON services FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_products_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON products FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_appointments_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON appointments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TRIGGER update_sales_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON sales FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();

-- ===============================================
-- DADOS INICIAIS DE EXEMPLO
-- ===============================================

-- Inserir barbearias
INSERT INTO barbershops (name, slug, address, phone, email, plan_id, is_active) VALUES
('Barbearia ClÃ¡ssica', 'barbearia-classica',
 '{"street":"Rua das Flores, 123","city":"SÃ£o Paulo","state":"SP","zipCode":"01234-567"}',
 '(11) 99999-9999', 'contato@barbeariaclassica.com', 'premium', true),
('Corte & Estilo', 'corte-estilo',
 '{"street":"Av. Paulista, 456","city":"SÃ£o Paulo","state":"SP","zipCode":"01310-100"}',
 '(11) 88888-8888', 'contato@corteestilo.com', 'basic', true)
ON CONFLICT (slug) DO NOTHING;

-- Inserir barbeiros
INSERT INTO barbers (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, specialty, commission_rate, status)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'JoÃ£o Silva',
    '(11) 97777-7777',
    'joao@barbeariaclassica.com',
    ARRAY['corte masculino', 'barba'],
    60.00,
    'active'
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO barbers (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, specialty, commission_rate, status)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Pedro Santos',
    '(11) 96666-6666',
    'pedro@barbeariaclassica.com',
    ARRAY['corte moderno', 'design'],
    55.00,
    'active'
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

-- Inserir serviÃ§os
INSERT INTO services (barbershop_id, name, description, category, duration, price, commission_rate)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Corte Masculino',
    'Corte tradicional masculino',
    'corte',
    30,
    25.00,
    50.00
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO services (barbershop_id, name, description, category, duration, price, commission_rate)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Barba Completa',
    'Aparar e modelar barba',
    'barba',
    20,
    15.00,
    50.00
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO services (barbershop_id, name, description, category, duration, price, commission_rate)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Corte + Barba',
    'Corte masculino + barba completa',
    'combo',
    45,
    35.00,
    55.00
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

-- Inserir produtos
INSERT INTO products (barbershop_id, name, description, category, brand, cost_price, sell_price, current_stock, min_stock)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Pomada Modeladora',
    'Pomada para cabelo com fixaÃ§Ã£o forte',
    'pomada',
    'Barber Line',
    8.00,
    15.00,
    50,
    10
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO products (barbershop_id, name, description, category, brand, cost_price, sell_price, current_stock, min_stock)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Shampoo Anti-Caspa',
    'Shampoo medicinal anti-caspa',
    'shampoo',
    'Clear Men',
    12.00,
    22.00,
    30,
    5
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

-- Inserir clientes
INSERT INTO clients (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, birth_date, total_visits, total_spent, status)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Carlos Oliveira',
    '(11) 95555-5555',
    'carlos@email.com',
    '1985-03-15',
    15,
    375.00,
    'vip'
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO clients (barbershop_id, name, phone, email, birth_date, total_visits, total_spent, status)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    'Roberto Lima',
    '(11) 94444-4444',
    'roberto@email.com',
    '1990-07-22',
    8,
    200.00,
    'active'
FROM barbershops bb WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

-- Inserir agendamentos (apenas os futuros)
INSERT INTO appointments (barbershop_id, client_id, barber_id, service_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, duration, status, price)
SELECT
    bb.id,
    c.id,
    b.id,
    s.id,
    CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day',
    '14:00',
    30,
    'confirmed',
    25.00
FROM barbershops bb
JOIN clients c ON c.barbershop_id = bb.id AND c.name = 'Carlos Oliveira'
JOIN barbers b ON b.barbershop_id = bb.id AND b.name = 'JoÃ£o Silva'
JOIN services s ON s.barbershop_id = bb.id AND s.name = 'Corte Masculino'
WHERE bb.slug = 'barbearia-classica'
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

-- ===============================================
-- VIEWS ÃšTEIS PARA RELATÃ“RIOS
-- ===============================================

-- View para mÃ©tricas do dashboard
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW dashboard_metrics AS
SELECT
    bb.id as barbershop_id,
    bb.name as barbershop_name,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments a WHERE a.barbershop_id = bb.id AND a.appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE) as appointments_today,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients c WHERE c.barbershop_id = bb.id AND c.status = 'active') as total_clients,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM barbers b WHERE b.barbershop_id = bb.id AND b.status = 'active') as total_barbers,
    (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) FROM sales s WHERE s.barbershop_id = bb.id AND DATE_TRUNC('month', s.sale_date) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)) as revenue_month,
    (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) FROM sales s WHERE s.barbershop_id = bb.id AND DATE(s.sale_date) = CURRENT_DATE) as revenue_today
FROM barbershops bb
WHERE bb.is_active = true;

-- View para agendamentos com detalhes
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW appointments_detailed AS
SELECT
    a.id,
    a.barbershop_id,
    a.appointment_date,
    a.appointment_time,
    a.duration,
    a.status,
    a.price,
    a.notes,
    a.created_at,
    c.name as client_name,
    c.phone as client_phone,
    b.name as barber_name,
    s.name as service_name,
    s.category as service_category
FROM appointments a
JOIN clients c ON a.client_id = c.id
JOIN barbers b ON a.barber_id = b.id
JOIN services s ON a.service_id = s.id;

COMMIT;

version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:

    networks:

    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"

    healthcheck:

  backend:

        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"

message.content:
This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
Analysis:
Let me chronologically analyze this conversation to understand the user's requests and my actions:

1. **Initial Context**: The user began with a comprehensive project status showing a fully deployed barbershop management system with frontend (React/TypeScript) and backend (Node.js/PostgreSQL) already in production.

2. **Main Problem Identification**: The user reported that frontend buttons weren't working, specifically mentioning errors in cadastros (registrations) across multiple pages: Agendamentos, Clientes, PDV, Barbeiros, ServiÃ§os, Produtos, Vendas. They provided error screenshots showing "Nenhuma barbearia selecionada" (No barbershop selected).

3. **My Initial Approach**: I created a comprehensive correction plan and identified the root cause: BarbershopContext wasn't initializing with barbershop data, causing all modals to fail.

4. **Key Actions Taken**:
   - Fixed BarbershopContext to auto-initialize with mock data
   - Created/updated 5 CRUD modals (clients, appointments, services, products, barbers)
   - Added fallbacks for API failures
   - Built and deployed new frontend image

5. **Database Issues**: When testing, the user reported "Erro ao carregar clientes" and "Novo Agendamento nÃ£o carrega". I initially tried to create mock data solutions, but the user explicitly stated "nÃ£o quero nada mock quero 100% funcional" (I don't want anything mock, I want 100% functional).

6. **Database Solution Attempts**: 
   - First tried creating a local PostgreSQL instance
   - User then provided correct remote database credentials: host: 5.78.113.107, Username: postgres, Port 5432, Password: Mfcd62!!Mfcd62!!SaaS
   - Updated backend configuration to use remote database
   - Built and deployed new backend

7. **Final Issue Discovery**: Testing revealed a UUID validation error (code: '22P02') - the frontend was sending string IDs like "bb-001" but PostgreSQL expected proper UUIDs.

8. **Current State**: The system is deployed but has a UUID mismatch between frontend context and database schema.

Summary:
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   The user's primary request was to fix non-functional frontend buttons across all pages (Agendamentos, Clientes, PDV, Barbeiros, ServiÃ§os, Produtos, Vendas). They provided error screenshots showing "Nenhuma barbearia selecionada" and explicitly requested a 100% functional system with real database integration, rejecting any mock data solutions.

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - React/TypeScript frontend with shadcn/ui components
   - Node.js/Express backend with TypeScript
   - PostgreSQL database with UUID primary keys
   - Docker Swarm deployment with rolling updates
   - React Query for state management
   - Context API for global state (BarbershopContext)
   - CRUD modals with form validation
   - REST API architecture

3. Files and Code Sections:
   - `/root/projetobarbearia1/frontend/src/contexts/BarbershopContext.tsx`
      - Critical file for managing barbershop selection state
      - Fixed to auto-initialize with mock barbershop data
      - Code snippet: Added automatic barbershop selection logic in useEffect
   
   - `/root/projetobarbearia1/frontend/src/components/modals/CreateClientModal.tsx`
      - Created complete client creation modal with validation
      - Integrated with API and React Query for state management
      - Includes error handling and toast notifications
   
   - `/root/projetobarbearia1/backend/src/database.ts`
      - Updated database connection configuration
      - Changed from local to remote PostgreSQL server
      - Final configuration: host: '5.78.113.107', database: 'barbearia_sistema', password: 'Mfcd62!!Mfcd62!!SaaS'
   
   - `/root/projetobarbearia1/backend/src/routes/clients.ts`
      - Restored full PostgreSQL implementation for client CRUD operations
      - Includes proper error handling and validation

4. Errors and fixes:
   - **"Nenhuma barbearia selecionada" error**: Fixed by updating BarbershopContext to auto-initialize with barbershop data instead of starting with null state
   - **Database connection failures**: Initially tried local PostgreSQL, but user provided correct remote credentials
   - **UUID validation error (code: '22P02')**: Discovered that frontend sends string IDs like "bb-001" but PostgreSQL expects proper UUIDs - this is the current unresolved issue

5. Problem Solving:
   Successfully diagnosed and fixed the BarbershopContext initialization issue. Implemented comprehensive CRUD modals with proper error handling. Established connection to remote PostgreSQL database. Currently troubleshooting UUID mismatch between frontend mock IDs and database schema requirements.

6. All user messages:
   - "contunua" - Request to continue implementation
   - "faz um teste funciona nos cadastros todos estÃ£o dando erro adicionei algumas imagem nesta caminho /root/projetobarbearia1/erro do erro .Mas todos as telas estaÃ£o com problemas Agendamentos Clientes PDV Barbeiros ServiÃ§os Produtos Vendas pasos por uma a uma e deixa tudo funcionado quando estuver tudo ok vai para proxima . monta uma plano decorreÃ§Ã£o e teste de cada botÃ£o"
   - "nÃ£o quero nada mock quero 100% funcional"
   - "host : 5.78.113.107 Username:postgres Port 5432 PasswordMfcd62!!Mfcd62!!SaaS"
   - "Criar uma nova imagem no Docker Swarm, realizar o build sem cache com uma nova tag e efetuar o redeploy"

7. Pending Tasks:
   - Fix UUID mismatch between frontend BarbershopContext (using string IDs like "bb-001") and PostgreSQL database (expecting proper UUIDs)
   - Update frontend to use real UUIDs from database
   - Test all CRUD operations end-to-end
   - Verify all pages are fully functional

8. Current Work:
   I was in the process of testing the APIs after deploying the new backend configuration. I discovered a UUID validation error when testing the clients API: the error shows `code: '22P02'` with message about invalid UUID format. The backend logs revealed that the frontend is sending "bb-001" as barbershop_id, but PostgreSQL expects a proper UUID format. This is the immediate issue blocking full functionality.

9. Optional Next Step:
   Fix the UUID mismatch by either: 1) Updating the BarbershopContext to fetch real barbershop UUIDs from the database, or 2) Querying the database to get the actual UUID for the existing barbershops and updating the frontend context accordingly. The specific task is to resolve the PostgreSQL error: "invalid input syntax for type uuid" when the frontend sends "bb-001" instead of a proper UUID format..
Please continue the conversation from where we left it off without asking the user any further questions. Continue with the last task that you were asked to work on.

content.text: I'll continue by fixing the UUID mismatch issue in the BarbershopContext. Let me first check the current database to see what barbershop UUIDs are available, then update the frontend to use proper UUIDs.

file.content:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-030641
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-032051
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"

        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-032452
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-032844
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

content.text: Vejo que o frontend estÃ¡ fazendo chamadas para `/api/...` mas precisa ser redirecionado para o backend. Vou verificar o arquivo de API para ver como estÃ¡ configurado o baseURL:

Perfeito! O arquivo api.ts estÃ¡ configurado corretamente para usar `https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`. Mas vi que no BarbershopContext estÃ¡ fazendo fetch diretamente para `/api/barbershops` sem usar o ApiClient. Vou corrigir isso:
Encontrei o problema! O BarbershopContext estÃ¡ fazendo fetch para `/api/barbershops` em vez de usar a URL completa. Vou corrigir isso:

content.text: Agora vou verificar se o Nginx do frontend estÃ¡ configurado para fazer proxy das requisiÃ§Ãµes `/api/` para o backend. Vou verificar o arquivo nginx.conf:
O nginx do frontend nÃ£o tem configuraÃ§Ã£o de proxy para `/api/`. Vou adicionar essa configuraÃ§Ã£o para fazer proxy das requisiÃ§Ãµes da API para o backend:
Agora vou reverter a mudanÃ§a no BarbershopContext para usar `/api/barbershops` novamente, jÃ¡ que o nginx vai fazer o proxy:

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-032452
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-033031
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-033637
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-033031
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-033850
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-033031
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:

version: '3.8'

2. Key Technical Concepts:

   - Nginx proxy configuration

3. Files and Code Sections:
   - `/root/projetobarbearia1/frontend/src/contexts/BarbershopContext.tsx`
     - Critical file for managing barbershop selection state
     - Fixed to fetch real barbershop data from API instead of mock data

file.content:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-034427
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-034535
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-040419

Vou verificar como o frontend estÃ¡ configurado:

AquÃ­ estÃ¡ o problema! O frontend estÃ¡ configurado para usar `https://api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br` diretamente, mas deveria usar o **proxy local** para evitar problemas de SSL.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-040419
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-040353
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3

toolUseResult.originalFile:
version: '3.8'

networks:
  network_public:
    external: true

services:
  frontend:
    image: barbe-frontend:20250922-041022
    networks:
      - network_public
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-frontend.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.rule=Host(`zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-frontend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.scheme=https"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.https-redirect.redirectscheme.permanent=true"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  backend:
    image: barbe-backend:20250922-040353
    networks:
      - network_public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - PORT=3001
      - FRONTEND_URL=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br
      - DB_HOST=5.78.113.107
      - DB_PORT=5432
      - DB_NAME=berbearia
      - DB_USER=postgres
      - DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      update_config:
        parallelism: 1
        delay: 10s
        failure_action: rollback
        order: start-first
      restart_policy:
        condition: on-failure
        delay: 5s
        max_attempts: 3
        window: 120s
      labels:
        - "traefik.enable=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.entrypoints=websecure"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt"
        - "traefik.http.services.barbe-backend.loadbalancer.server.port=3001"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.rule=Host(`api.zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br`)"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.entrypoints=web"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend-redirect.middlewares=https-redirect"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowmethods=GET,OPTIONS,PUT,POST,DELETE,PATCH"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolallowheaders=*"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolalloworiginlist=https://zbarbe.zenni-ia.com.br"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.accesscontrolmaxage=100"
        - "traefik.http.middlewares.backend-cors.headers.addvaryheader=true"
        - "traefik.http.routers.barbe-backend.middlewares=backend-cors"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
